transcripts.text: For 33 years, the Temple Institute has been building and teaching and sharing the truth and beauty of the Holy Temple, striving to prepare Israel and the world for the rebuilding of the Holy Temple in Jerusalem, soon in our days.

The Temple Institute is a nonprofit organization.  Our ability to continue our work and outreach depends upon you.  In the words of the prophet Isaiah, my house shall be called a house of prayer for all nations.
Please support the work of the Temple Institute.
